body:
Hi @gtoison,

Thanks for the bug report!

This is definitely a bug in the sniper printer. It's trying to compare to source fragments that are, in terms of source position, overlapping. It may be trying to compare source fragments from different files, which I've previously fixed a bug for with static method imports (see #3743).

I will look at this as soon as possible, but I'm a bit swamped right now so if anyone else has the time to look into it, feel free!
Thank you very much for the confirmation!

rename.from: Combining CtSuperAccess and CtUnaryOperator lead to SpoonException with Sniper
rename.to: bug: Combining CtSuperAccess and CtUnaryOperator lead to SpoonException with Sniper

issue.title: test: Test reproducing issue #4021

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

issue.body:
A simple unit test reproducing issue #4021, comment out the `Disabled` annotation and the test should fail with a `SpoonException`.

The issue seems to be triggered by a `super` invocation with a unary operator as argument (`-x`)

body:
@slarse I've submitted a small PR with a failing unit test reproducing the issue.
Hopefully this helps, if not feel free to reject it!

Finally found the time to look into this.

The cause of the crash is that the end source position given by JDT is off for the `super` reference, it always includes the `-` (or any other unary operator). However, if one omits the unary operator, then suddenly the source position is correct. Very strange behavior, probably a bug in JDT.

For now we can easily work around it as the start position of the reference is correct, and the length of it is known.

issue.title: fix: fix sniper bug delated to source position of super reference

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

issue.body:
Fix #4021 

See https://github.com/INRIA/spoon/issues/4021#issuecomment-897634177 for a description of the problem.

The tl;dr is that the end position of a super reference is incorrect from JDT when it's followed by a unary operator. This PR simply sets the end position of a super reference relative to it's start position, which is possible as `super` always has the same amount of characters.

issue.title: release  Spoon 9.1.0

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

issue.body:
# New features

* Add mode ignore-syntax-errors. (PR: #4054)
* Add API method CtAbstractSwitch.addCaseAt. (PR: #4015)
* Add OFF log level to StandardEnvironment. (PR: #3904)
* Add CtFormalTypeDeclarer.addFormalCtTypeParameterAt. (PR: #3896)
* Add CtExecutable.addParameterAt. (PR: #3902)
* Add CtAbstractInvocation.addArgumentAt method. (PR: #3885)


# Bug fixes

* noclasspath: Handle type resolution of anonymous class with unresolved constructor. (PR: #3971)
* spoon-control-flow: Fix disconnected graphs for switch statements. (PR: #4004)
* spoon-visualiser: Bump Interacto to use the latest version on Central. (PR: #3861)
* Fix type parameter contract of setParent. (PR: #4099)
* Make lambda type implicit to avoid auto-importing type targeted in lambda. (PR: #4093)
* Fix sniper bug delated to source position of super reference. (PR: #4092)
* Fix the insertion order for CtStatementListImpl.insertBegin. (PR: #4065)
* Get correct descriptions from CtJavaDocImpl. (PR: #4061)
* Fix compliance level support for old code. (PR: #4068)
* Set correct names to modules in JDTBatchCompiler. (PR: #4073)
* Fix the insertion order for CtCaseImpl.insertBegin. (PR: #4063)
* Fix equality for CtCodeSnippet. (PR: #4024)
* Simplify code using Map.computeIfAbsent. (PR: #4027)
* Fix method resolution for inner interfaces. (PR: #4008)
* Fix crash on handling parameterized ProblemReferenceBinding. (PR: #3964)
* Fix crash on null type binding in nested type during search. (PR: #3961)
* Ensure that for init/update are registered in listeners. (PR: #3941)
* Fix snippet compilation bugs. (PR: #3897)
* Fix infinite loop on type parameter in qualified name. (PR: #3905)
* Fix snippet compilation when snippet follows a CtComment. (PR: #3888)
* Fix sniper printer failing to prepend whitespace to top-added CtModifiable. (PR: #3856)
* Fix a race condition in AbstractParallelProcessor. (PR: #3844)


# Documentation

* Clarify use of default/case labels in CtCase.setCaseExpression/s(). (PR: #4039)
* Add note in CONTRIBUTING.md about force-pushing. (PR: #4013)
* Improve Javadoc quality in Environment interface. (PR: #3968)
* Add missing Javadoc tags to documented public methods in CtScanner. (PR: #3934)
* Update list of contributors. (PR: #3900)
* Add website deployment documentation. (PR: #3889)
* Update README and docs related to spoon-smpl. (PR: #3869)
* Add API documentation to 3 undocumented public methods. (PR: #3854)


# Refactoring

* ReferenceBuilder
  * Refactor getting type refeference from TypeVariableBinding. (PR: #3991)
  * Extract small reference-building subroutines into helpers. (PR: #3981)
  * Remove dead code. (PR: #3976)
  * Extract parameterized type reference creation into helpers. (PR: #3966)
* Fix unchecked type conversions. (PR: #4095)
* Simplify set creation in CtReferenceImpl. (PR: #4097)
* Fix wonky indentation in CtModifierHandler.setModifiers. (PR: #4081)
* Simplify implementation of `getCaseExpression` and `setCaseExpression`. (PR: #4023)
* Remove unused local variable declarations. (PR: #4028)
* Revert incorrect move of test. (PR: #4029)
* Remove redundant if statement. (PR: #4011)
* Remove unnecessary unchecked cast in getParent(Class). (PR: #3973)
* Implement check for recursive type bound without using Object. (PR: #3865)
* Fix violation of Sonar rule 1444. (PR: #3853)
* Fix violation of Sonar rule 2142. (PR: #3930)
* Fix violation of Sonar rule 2097. (PR: #3972)
* Fix violations of Sonar rule 2057. (PR: #3866)
* Fix 1 violation of Sonar rule 2142. (PR: #3852)


# Performance

* Replace regex in identifier checks with loop. (PR: #4072)


# Tests

* Add tests for CtStatementList. (PR: #4089)
* Add test for CacheBasedConflictFinder. (PR: #4088)
* Add additional tests for CtCase.insertBegin/End. (PR: #4082)
* Add test for createReference. (PR: #4078)
* Add test for removeAnnotation method. (PR: #4056)
* Add tests for CtComment.equals. (PR: #4053)
* Migrate more tests to junit-5. (PR: #4045)
* Add tests for JavaOutputProcessor class. (PR: #4043)
* Make CtInheritanceScanner architecture test print correct class name. (PR: #4037)
* Add tests for the Check class. (PR: #4034)
* Add test reproducing issue #4021. (PR: #4030)
* Add additional tests for the Substitution class. (PR: #4018)
* Unite all tests for Substitution in one place. (PR: #4016)
* Add test for Substituion.insertAllSuperInterfaces. (PR: #4012)
* Add tests for the SpoonTreeBuilder class. (PR: #4006)
* Migrate support and testing tests to Junit5. (PR: #4009)
* Migrate all refactoring tests to Junit5. (PR: #4007)
* Add test for Substitution.insertAllConstructors. (PR: #4005)
* Add test for Substitution.insertAllNestedTypes. (PR: #3998)
* Add test for insertAllFields method. (PR: #3995)
* Add test for AbstractTemplate.isWellFormed(). (PR: #3990)
* Migrate all the template tests to Junit5. (PR: #3986)
* Improve tests for NameFilter class. (PR: #3975)
* Improve the test for SpoonTagger class. (PR: #3982)
* Migrate CtTypeReferenceTest to Junit5. (PR: #3969)
* Migrate ProcessingTest to Juit5. (PR: #3959)
* Migrate AstCheckerTest to Junit5. (PR: #3960)
* Migrate CtGenerationTest to junit5. (PR: #3958)
* Migrate CorrectIdentifierTest to JUnit5. (PR: #3956)
* Migrate FilterTest to Junit5. (PR: #3946)
* Migrate LogTest to JUnit5. (PR: #3939)
* Migrate TestSniperPrinter to JUnit5. (PR: #3921)


# Other

* Add tag pinning to GHA digest update. (PR: #4080)
* Migrate Javadoc regression script to Python. (PR: #4032)
* Try to list new errors in javadoc regression check. (PR: #4025)
* Format parent pom. (PR: #3994)
* Fix incorrect early exit in Javadoc quality script. (PR: #3932)
* Improve ci-checkstyle-javadoc.sh usability. (PR: #3924)
* Add CI check for method/constructor Javadoc quality. (PR: #3907)
* Add job for sorald-buildbreaker. (PR: #3912)
* Move Checkstyle config location into property. (PR: #3910)
* Fixed license URL in pom.xml. (PR: #3892)
* Bump license-maven-plugin to version 4.0. (PR: #3887)
* Disable Git's autocrlf feature to fix Windows build failures. (PR: #3881)
* Remove all traces of Travis CI. (PR: #3883)
* Update github action to use setup-java v2.0.0. (PR: #3874)
* Add script for SNAPSHOT version injection in CI. (PR: #3873)
* Remove snapshot repository to self. (PR: #3864)
* Remove outdated instances of maven.inria.fr. (PR: #3860)
* Use the kramdown Markdown processor for Spoon's website. (PR: #3859)
* Make URL to apidocs site relative. (PR: #3862)
* Add website CNAME. (PR: #3863)
* We're now 9.1.0-SNAPSHOT.
